short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securing the Canvas frontend with tracking limiters and vulnerability barriers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure the Canvas frontend with tracking limiters and vulnerability barriers. SecureCanvas blocks some requests from the Canvas frontend that tracks users. It also includes a button next to all embeds and iframes that will load the original embed content when clicked. This is to stop some attacks on the user using embeds.
